meanings.sent1: The patients in the hospital were resting in their beds.
meanings.sent2: The doctor saw many patients in the clinic today.
meanings.sent3: The patients in the waiting room started a game of cards to pass the time.
meanings.sent4: The patients waiting for their turn were like pieces on a chessboard, each with a different move.
meanings.sent5: The image of the patients lined up in the hallway stayed with me long after I left the hospital.

meanings.definition: The ability to wait calmly for a long time without becoming annoyed or anxious.
meanings.sent1: The teacher praised the students for their patience during the test.
meanings.sent2: She showed great patience while waiting for her friend to arrive.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's patience paid off when it finally got the treat.
meanings.sent4: Patience is like a gentle breeze that soothes the mind in times of waiting.
meanings.sent5: His patience was a shining example to everyone around him.
